originalText.text: Yutong and Unlock Chinese has been an absolutely wonderful in accelerating my Chinese learning journey. It's very rare to find a program that supports advanced heritage Chinese learning, and each class was thoughtfully tailored to my proficiency level and specific learning goals. I came out of the courses with not only a bigger vocabulary, but also a nuanced understanding of when phrases should be used and an appreciation of how to converse accurately to sound more like a native speaker.

originalText.text: Yutong is genuinely an incredible teacher who really teaches from the heart. I've only been taking classes for 5 months, and I already feel like my confidence and language comprehension skills have significantly improved from when I first started. I appreciate that we learn vocabulary that are relevant to our own lives and interests that go along with whatever topic that we're learning in the textbook. Classes are a lot of fun and are truly a highlight to my week :) ðŸ’“

originalText.text: My experience in learning beginner level Chinese at Unlock Chinese has been wonderful. I was in a group class with Yutong, and Yutong is an amazing, engaging, and patient teacher. The classroom dialogues, real life applications, and homework were incredibly helpful in motivating me to practice. Highly recommend learning Chinese with Yutong and other teachers here!

text.text: My experience in learning beginner level Chinese at Unlock Chinese has been wonderful. I was in a group class with Yutong, and Yutong is an amazing, engaging, and patient teacher. The classroom dialogues, real life applications, and homework were incredibly helpful in motivating me to practice. Highly recommend learning Chinese with Yutong and other teachers here!

originalText.text: Highly recommend! I began taking lessons with Yutong during my freshman year of high school, and have been studying Mandarin for roughly three years now. Throughout these three years my Mandarin has improved tremendously due to Yutongâ€™s dedicated tutoring. I started taking lessons as a beginner, with almost no ability to read or write characters. In three short years, my reading/writing skills are upper-intermediate level and I am conversing fluently with native speakers. I recently passed HSK 3 and am currently studying for HSK 4. Yutongâ€™s lessons are a great balance between relaxed conversation and more focused learning/HSK test preparation. Overall, I would highly recommend Unlock Chinese to anyone, regardless or level or age.

originalText.text: Highly recommend Unlock Chinese. Yutong is an amazing teacher and friend! Iâ€™ve been taking lessons with her for about a year, and my Mandarin is far better than its ever been. My improvements have tremendous. Classes strike a good balance of friendly conversation and textbook-based exercises. I find it demanding yet workable in my schedule, and she will work with you to make it as demanding as you needâ€¦ overall, just a great teacher. Oh, and she is natively bilingual in Cantonese and Mandarin, and teaches/manages classes in both, so if you want to double up on your dialectsâ€¦this is your one-stop shop!
